Topic.Title: Victoriana - Choose Your Own Adventure Mobile Game

Posts.EditableText:
Hello text adventurers, 

I am here to announce my CYOA mobile app; Victoriana.*
It is set in the 19th century, and I have given it a steampunk vibe with several kooky gadgets to use in the Victorian world. 

It is free to play, and available on both the Google Playstore and Appstore for iOS users. 
The links to both versions are just here, and I hope you enjoy my game.

Yours cordially, 

Cyril.

PlayStore/Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cyrilsplutterworth.victoriantextadventure

Appstore/iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/victoriana-text-adventure/id1320802848?mt=8

*The reason why I haven't uploaded it to the site itself is the app files don't match the narrow set of filetypes allowed by the site.
Posts.HTML:
Hello text adventurers,

I am here to announce my CYOA mobile app; Victoriana.*
It is set in the 19th century, and I have given it a steampunk vibe with several kooky gadgets to use in the Victorian world.

It is free to play, and available on both the Google Playstore and Appstore for iOS users.
The links to both versions are just here, and I hope you enjoy my game.

Yours cordially,

Cyril.

PlayStore/Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cyrilsplutterworth.victoriantextadventure

Appstore/iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/victoriana-text-adventure/id1320802848?mt=8

*The reason why I haven't uploaded it to the site itself is the app files don't match the narrow set of filetypes allowed by the site.
